title: Snapchat : distribution of global audiences 2020 , by gender
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of active users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Share of active users 61.0 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Share of active users is 38.0.
The difference of Share of active users between the highest and lowest Sex is 23.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of active users for 2 number of Sexs.
The Share of active users is appeared to be the highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of active users for 2 number of Sexs.
The maximum Share of active users 61.0 is found at Sex Female and the minimum is found at Male where Share of active users is 38.0.
The difference of Share of active users between the highest and lowest Sex is 23.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Share of active users in the y axis.
Sex Female has the highest Share of active users and Male has the lowest Share of active users.
There is a difference of 23.0 between the maximum Sex Female and minimum Sex Male.
The Sex Male tends to be 1.23 percent lower than average.
The Share of active users is 99.0 if we add up values of all Sexs.
